message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item to you first at a premium price of $200. I think you'll agree it's worth it, but let me know your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I'm not looking to break the bank.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $120 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $180. I'm confident you'll find this to be a fair price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $180 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $145. Can you consider that?
